name: Ed The Eggplant
description:
You can fullscreen with the button at the bottom right of the game!

Help Ed the eggplant get out of this awful dungeon! There's sunlight at the end of the tunnel and that's what Ed needs to win the game. There are ten a-MAZE-ing levels - and Ed's pedometer is running. Can you beat the game taking the fewest steps?

Leave a screenshot of your best score in the comments!

How to play:

  • Spacebar to proceed past the title screen
  • Spacebar to restart from the beginning of the current level
  • Arrow keys to navigate Ed through the dungeon

Ed always starts at the top left of the maze and the sunlight is always at the bottom right! Good luck!

Ed The Eggplant is an experiment with the "hunt and kill" maze generation algorithm.

Music credit, track is "Weird" by "Dust Mill" licensed CC BY-NC-ND 3.0
